assessment.title: Breast Cancer Risk Assessment
assessment.description: Please answer all questions to get an accurate risk assessment.

questions.hasLump: Have you noticed a lump in your breast?
questions.lumpSurface: Is the surface of the lump irregular?
questions.lumpSizeChange: Has the lump increased in size in the past month?
questions.sizeIncreaseRate: How fast has the size increased?
questions.neckNodules: Have you noticed any nodules in your neck?
questions.weightLoss: Have you experienced unexplained weight loss?
questions.shape: Does your breast appear like an orange peel, like the image shown below
